name: MPC 2015
body:
# Important dates

* Paper submission           2 February 2015
* Online PC meeting          9 - 13 March 2015
* Author notification        16 March 2015
* Camera ready deadline      13 April 2015
* Conference                 sometime between 17 June and 17 July 2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
